components.name: apps.make.com
components.description: Help page: Introdutcion to Make Apps

incident_updates.body: Functionality has been restored on eu2.make.com and us1.make.celonis.com. We're working on restoring the remaining zones and will post an update within the next 30 minutes.
We've identified the issues and restored the login page for make.com. We're now working to restore full functionality across all zones and will update you on our progress within the next 30 minutes.

Our engineering team continues to investigate the issue impacting all zones. We are treating this as an absolute emergency and are working around the clock to identify the root cause.  
We will keep you informed and share updates as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineering team is continuing to investigate the root cause of the issue affecting all zones.

We are actively working to restore full functionality as quickly as possible. We will provide the next update within 30 minutes, or sooner if new information becomes available.

We are currently experiencing issues across all zones. Users may encounter Bad Gateway errors and be unable to access the platform or execute scenarios successfully. Our team is actively investigating the cause, and we will provide an update within the next 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.
